summary: This document is an email chain forwarded by an FBI Special Agent. It contains an extortion threat from Anthony Pompliano to Mark L. Epstein, referencing Jeffrey Epstein's case, alleging Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Epstein's island, and threatening to expose this to the IRGC (Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps) unless paid $10,000.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.role: Email recipient and subject of extortion
persons.context: Brother of Jeffrey Epstein; recipient of an extortion email from Anthony Pompliano demanding $10,000 and referencing his brother's case and alleged activities involving Donald Trump.

persons.name: Anthony Pompliano
persons.context: Claims to be an IRGC informant; sends an extortion email to Mark L. Epstein alleging Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island and demanding $10,000 to stop contacting him.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Attorney copied on the email chain forwarded to the FBI; likely involved in the legal matters related to Mark L. Epstein or the Epstein case.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Alleged by Anthony Pompliano to have had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island; mentioned as a figure the IRGC hates due to an assassination.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Referred to as Mark L. Epstein's brother; his island is the alleged location of the underage sexual encounter involving Donald Trump.

connections.description: Mark L. Epstein is identified as the brother of Jeffrey Epstein in the extortion email.
Pompliano sends an extortion email to Mark L. Epstein demanding $10,000, threatening to expose alleged information about Trump and Epstein to the IRGC.
The email alleges Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island, implying a prior association.
Stacey Richman is copied on the email chain involving Mark L. Epstein, suggesting she is an attorney representing or advising him.

events.title: Extortion Email Sent
events.description: Anthony Pompliano sends an extortion email to Mark L. Epstein, alleging Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island and demanding $10,000.

events.title: Email Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An FBI Special Agent forwards the extortion email chain to another FBI recipient, indicating the matter was brought to law enforcement attention.

keyFacts: Anthony Pompliano sent an extortion email to Mark L. Epstein (Jeffrey Epstein's brother) demanding $10,000.
The email alleges Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island.
Pompliano claims to be an IRGC (Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps) informant and threatens to expose the Trump allegation to the IRGC if not paid.
The email chain was forwarded to the FBI by a Special Agent, indicating it was treated as a potential threat or evidence.
The document references the assassination of an IRGC commander as a reason for the IRGC's hatred of Trump.
